overview: Dr. Hubert Kostal brings over 23 years of international experience in high technology engineering, marketing and sales to his position at Radiant Imaging. His management responsibilities span direct sales, sales channels, technical sales support, product management, and product and corporate marketing. Prior to joining Radiant Imaging, Dr. Kostal has held executive sales and marketing positions at both start-up and established companies addressing industrial, consumer electronics, communications, and defense markets. Dr. Kostal previously worked at APIC (Advanced Photonic Integrated Circuits) Corp., as VP of Business Development; NanoOpto Corp., which developed and manufactured nanotechnology enabled optical components, as VP of Sales and Marketing; SpectraSwitch Corp., which applied liquid crystal technologies to optical switching, as VP of Marketing; TranSwitch Corp., a communications semiconductor developer, as VP of Marketing; and at Lucent Technologies/AT&T/AT&T Bell Laboratories in various executive and management roles. In those positions, Dr. Kostal has defined innovative product and marketing strategies, and successfully grown market presence and sales volumes.
